website_summaries.verdict: Acts as an inexpensive space-saving solution for anyone who doesn’t have room for a nightstand. Keeps items together conveniently.
pros: Variety of storage pockets to keep items organized
Keeps smaller items, like a remote, from getting lost
Design allows it to be positioned close to bed and not bulky
Easy to use and to reposition as it simply slides under mattress
cons: May slip out of place if overloaded and too heavy
Does not provide a flat surface to rest drinks or alarm clock

customer_reviews.title: I like it. It works
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It works. I keep my "buttons" (remote controls for TV, room fan, AC, DVD, and sometimes my reading glasses (not the best place because of the potential for sratching), and have never had the caddy fall out. Didn't realize until today that they's also a pocket for magazines, but since I get mine onlline, could use it for tissues (but not an entire box of them!).
customer_reviews.author: CalNative

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Stay In Place
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept, and Buzzfeed recommends items like this constantly, but this just refused to stay underneath the mattress and slips out constantly. I don't have a nightstand on my side of the bed so I thought this would help to hold my phone in while charging, and that's all that's in it, so it's not like I'm weighing it down heavily. I ended up needing to nail it to the wall which completely defeats the purpose. Perhaps if it had velcro, or maybe if I stapled it down to the bed frame, but otherwise it doesn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I never knew something like this existed! I was on Pinterest and their was a picture with a link of where to buy. It was for the container store. They were more than I wanted to spend. I thought I'd try Amazon and bingo!! Same thing for a lot less. Thanks amazon!! Oh and I was worried I might knock it or bump into it in the middle of the night getting in and out of bed and no fear, it fits perfectly answer positions perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Thelilnapper

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but poorly made product.
customer_reviews.text: It worked wonderfully and was perfect for storing my phone, compression gloves, and journal. Then it ripped down the side less than a month after I bought it. :( I am going to sew it back up, but it's pretty disappointing that it basically fell apart when I had barely anything in it. I wish they would have reinforced the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: This can be used with a side board bed frame or without. We have dual adjustable beds (with side frames), between bed and tv remotes, we were losing them in the bed. Now we each have a bedside organizer and all is well. No more me grabbing the wrong bed remote and adjusting my husbands bed instead of mine in the middle of the night! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have it.
customer_reviews.text: Don't really own a bed room set yet (dressers ect..), so we didn't have any place to put our remotes, except next to our heads when we sleep or on the floor. That got old real quick! So I got this, to give the remotes a home when we don't use them. Works out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Caroline

customer_reviews.title: The possibilies of the use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these one of next to my bed. The other for the remotes in the living room. I have a problem with this on my bed as its an adjustable base; so I screwed this into my computer stand for the removes in the bedroom. The remotes holders feel a little unstable based on the size of the remote. I am very happy with this item and I will recommend this to all my friends and associates.
customer_reviews.author: Charles of the Desert

customer_reviews.title: Love the storage!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for two reasons: #1 - I hate nightstand clutter and #2 - we have an adjustable base bed and when it's raised, it makes it hard to reach the nightstand. This holds everything I need it to, but sometimes comes loose when the bed is adjusted. Overall, it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn C.

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of Those Cluttered Nightstands!
customer_reviews.text: If you're sick of hunting for things when you're reading and sick of clutter on your nightstand, you will love this Bedside Storage Organizer. I actually use it on a chaise in my bedroom and have found it perfect to keep things close at hand but neatly stored. Definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: SoozeSays

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my bed, to store my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bed, to store my remotes, phone, and chromebook when I'm sleeping. I have a very small chromebook, but the main pocket is way too small for it to fit, in spite of the photo used in the description showing a very thick catalog in that pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: This bedside caddy is now a must for me. Being at college I don't have anything beside my bed to put my glasses, phone or iPad when I am ready to go to sleep so having this is great! It keeps everything separated and neat. I also love it because when my bed is made it is hidden so no one would even know it's there.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy! Well made! Hangs in place!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well made. Handles my needs for a TV remote holder as well as a place to store my eye glasses case. I love how it slides in between the mattress and the box string for a secure hold. I have never had it fall out of place. I ordered the chocolate brown and simply love it! I am actually thinking about ordering a second one!
customer_reviews.author: twitchnln

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality! Don't buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible description of this item. Very flimsy. Terrible quality. And they don't honor Amazon prime return policy, which it doesn't say ANYWHERE in the product description or on the seller page. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Jones

customer_reviews.title: Grrrreeeeaaaatttt!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for all my clutter! Now, I can find the remotes, my phone and my iPad. Grrrrreeeeaaaat!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and does the job. Pockets hold all my remotes. I have it hanging over the side of my end table next to the couch. I have to straighten it out once in awhile but it hasn't come close to falling and for the price I can't complain!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Genius product.
customer_reviews.text: Wish the part that goes in between the mattresses was a little longer to help with the just in case you have too much weight in the pockets but otherwise this product is awesome and works great for my kids!!
customer_reviews.author: JesButter

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: These things are great on our bedsides!!! We have one hanging on each side of our bed. These slip right under the mattress and hold well. We use these to hold our cell phones, tablets and remote controls! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The bedside storage organizer is nice but it doesn't hold as much as I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: The bedside storage organizer is nice but it doesn't hold as much as I thought it would. Even at that I would give it a higher score but every time I make the bed in our RV it falls on the floor. I'm going to look for a solution to connect it more permanently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: The four separate pockets are easy to open and store items such as reading glasses, remote controls, and a paperback book. Works as a good substitute if you do not have the convenience of a night table.
customer_reviews.author: S. Norton

customer_reviews.title: Holds so much!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that because our bed only has a mattress (and no box spring) that if we put too much items in it, it would fall - but it doesnt! Our nightstands don't have cupboards so our remotes, iPad etc was always everywhere, and this way it's now so organized. It holds a lot - we have 3 remotes, iPad, Kindle, and lip balm. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Marshall

customer_reviews.title: doesn't stay put
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, except it always slides out from between the mattress and mattress pad - so kind of defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good for storage, but if you have a thick mattress, it’s to far down to easily reach.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Collett

customer_reviews.title: Inobtrusive and roomy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this caddy. I saw something like it in a store, and then spotted this on Amazon for a much lower price, and I am very happy. It fits my iPad, my bedside meds, pens, remotes: whatever you want. It really will clear the clutter on your bedside table.
customer_reviews.author: Bearwife

customer_reviews.title: Holds my Kindle, Remote and a few Other Things
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like is the dirt brown color. Other than that it stays in place and does the job of removing distracting items from my side table.
customer_reviews.author: Ima Critic

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to get the remotes into if you're just trying to reach down from the bed without looking. Serves it's purpose. Otherwise pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Gal

customer_reviews.title: couldn't get it to stay put between my mattress and ...
customer_reviews.text: couldn't get it to stay put between my mattress and box spring. just not enough friction. maybe if the flap was longer or made with a less slippery material...
customer_reviews.author: mark a

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, we definitely use it. However, it's advertised to 'work' over the headboard, but due to the design, it can fall off relatively easy if you are using it in this matter. We've had it for a bit and its fallen down maybe 3-4 times. Overall though, it makes our controllers more accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hold my phone and sometimes my tablet and my bedside essentials and it holds it all.
customer_reviews.author: LidZBarnes

customer_reviews.title: Love hanging this off my night stand (I always have ...
customer_reviews.text: Love hanging this off my night stand (I always have something on my nightstand that'll hold it in place) so I can have my remotes easily accessible and I use the longer slot for holding my charging cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Its a great idea if designed better
customer_reviews.text: Pockets are to short for my remotes, needs to be anchored or will slip off table. Its a great idea if designed better.
customer_reviews.author: Gem

customer_reviews.title: This item won't stay put. It needed some velcro ...
customer_reviews.text: This item won't stay put. It needed some velcro attachments adding in order to have it stay in place, and I feel that something so elementary should have been thought of by the product designers.
customer_reviews.author: P. White

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, it does what it supposes to do. It is nothing great though. It keeps falling to the floor because there is no way to secure it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz M.

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: it's great. I like it a lot. Is very sturdy and never falls out from between my bed. I load it with a bunch of stuff like my many eyemasks, 2 remote controls, my phone and a few chargers.
customer_reviews.author: devon

customer_reviews.title: Keeps everything neat and organized
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to keep phone charger cords off the floor, also I place my cell phone in it when I am using ear buds in bed. Has three vented pockets in front and another pocket behind that.
customer_reviews.author: Konaman

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.  Very handy!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed! My remote collection grew a bit, and I lost the table I usually stored them on (an exercise bike is in it's place. LOL), so this worked perfectly for my needs. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Keith T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for backboard.
customer_reviews.text: We put it in the middle of the backboard. We needed a neutral place to put the remote and our electronics. You can also fit a drink in the middle pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Nile

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not a good
customer_reviews.text: The pockets started sagging forward on putting phone/remote in them. Finally tore off within a week. Definitely not a good product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: love it and all the pockets, fits great between mattress and box spring
customer_reviews.author: Monee

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not the best built item and continuously slides out from between the mattress
customer_reviews.author: MeowMy

customer_reviews.title: very handy
customer_reviews.text: Works great for holding my tablet and Glock 19 at my bedside.
customer_reviews.author: Ran-D

customer_reviews.title: Useful, Helpful & at a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: Very simple, easy to use product & comes available in navy blue, a suitable color for me. I put it between the mattress & the box spring & use it to hold my medications. I don't have to reach on the nightstand and knock things over - I can just reach down next to me to get what I need. And it's a reasonable price too
customer_reviews.author: Redlight

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and dependable
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hold my phone, tablet, and the occasional book. It holds everything and hasn't budged. Overall good product
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J Fritschle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lifesaver. Holds fan remote, tv remote, iPad, 3DS or small hand held game device, pocket for glasses and iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth the money. Very pleased. I was worried about my items being too heavy and the organizer slipping and falling to floor. I have a Kindle, 2 remotes and my iPhone6 plus all at one time and it doesn't move!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Sommer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Bought the brown color and came slightly ahead of estimated delivery date. Product the same as described. Not too big and not too small. Perfect for my mobile phone and my magazine or kindle reader.
customer_reviews.author: LuDeaRN

customer_reviews.title: Soooort of works....
customer_reviews.text: The under mattress part should be longer of have some kind of gripping powert. Add some length or hook and loop to keep it from slipping due to weight of items it holds.
customer_reviews.author: kulma

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Now we don’t have to constantly search the bed for remotes, I swear we have like 4. Stores them easily and now less arguments on who lost them!!
customer_reviews.author: RaRa

customer_reviews.title: Handy Little Thing!
customer_reviews.text: Handy to have my remote, phone chargers and such at the side of my bed and not taking up room on my night stand making it appear to be so cluttered! Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: shari l hanson

customer_reviews.title: Great product. The only draw back is that unfortunately ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The only draw back is that unfortunately for me I have to use Velcro to keep it from sliding out between the mattress and the frame. I would recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Bedside storage organizer! Ilovetoshop brand
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Just received. Working well for my situation! Using as a bedside organizer. Stayed tucked in under mattress well.
customer_reviews.author: Ed209

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: This little organizer is perfect. It is well made, and it holds my books, cellphone, and fitbit/ charger. It is a great price as well!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Marie Goodmiller

customer_reviews.title: Nice little product
customer_reviews.text: Nice little product! I keep my remotes, phone, kindle, and magazine here. Keeps everything in one spot so my cat doesn't knock it all off my nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: Bdarby

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer.
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made. It has a good size and a nice panel that fits under the mattress, insuring that it will support a great deal of weight.
customer_reviews.author: +kevin

customer_reviews.title: Neat and tidy way to store my charging devices.
customer_reviews.text: This has revolutionized my bedtime area! Everything is much neater and better contained, and not sprawled out all over the nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I love that we have these instead of night stands. Our bedroom is small, so this works great. Pockets are plenty big enough and easy to find when you're tired.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Rook

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is really handy It fits really well under the mattress, doesn't slide out, and it is just the right size for my cell phone, glasses and book.
customer_reviews.author: sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great to keep my cell phone and other items because I don't have room for a side table next to bed.
customer_reviews.author: PILRBNQ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect size, perfect everything. recommend buying if you need a convenient little storage at bedside.
customer_reviews.author: kade dahl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It’s perfect since I have to have a CPAP machine on my bedside table taking up room.
customer_reviews.author: MaryLu Coupland

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: The pockets aren't as roomy as I would like. It's ok, but would have liked it better if the pockets were roomier.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W

customer_reviews.title: Smells Like Bleach & Ammonia
customer_reviews.text: It smelled like someone combined every heavy duty cleaning product in the world and dipped this bedside thing in it. Couldn’t stand the smell, so we sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay in place
customer_reviews.text: This is not heavy-weight enough to stay in place between mattresses - continues to slide out. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and great cost
customer_reviews.text: Works just as expected. Now I don’t have to reach out far to grab all my stuff like glasses, remotes etc. Nice price also.
customer_reviews.author: Brian James

customer_reviews.title: but tucks nicely over the drawer of the nightstand and provides easily ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work well under the mattress of our new adjustable bed frame, but tucks nicely over the drawer of the nightstand and provides easily accessible pockets for adjustable bed remote, TV remote, etc. Very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bedside storage pockets
customer_reviews.text: One of the most useful items I have ever purchased. The pockets are the right size to hold a tablet, phone, remote or book. My bedroom is too small for bedside tables so I use this organizer to hold anything that I might need right by my bed. I was surprised at how well it stay in place just by sliding the flat end in between the mattress and box spring.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Needs constant readjusting
customer_reviews.text: The pocket portion is exactly what it needs to be, but the portion that tucks in between the box spring and the mattress is too small and doesn't have enough grip so it frequently slips out. I'm always having to fix its placement so will need to add something to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: R. Scott Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Great for RV
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for use in our RV to hold a cell phone, paperback, and ear buds. If it had a small velcro tab to help hold it in place (in the RV) it would have been 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: So happy!
customer_reviews.text: Just wish one of the pockets was bigger for my PS3 controller. 1st world problems though so its okay i'm super happy
customer_reviews.author: Angelique Aubrahm

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really stay in place under mattress, have to constantly push it back in
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: ... losing my remotes in my bed and it works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I kept losing my remotes in my bed and it works like a charm, holding them on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and now all my friends and family want one after seeing mine :D
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed! It really helps me save time from searching for remotes. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: could be better
customer_reviews.text: Will not stay put...keeps sliding ...needs velcro or something ...ok...could be better

customer_reviews.title: Very good organizer
customer_reviews.text: I have this by my bed it holds everything that was on my nightstand giving me much more room easy to reach I have used it everyday

customer_reviews.title: does not stay
customer_reviews.text: This would not stay- don't use if there is anything heavy you want to put in it
customer_reviews.author: Aliceinwonderdeland

customer_reviews.title: De clutter
customer_reviews.text: I put it with the sofa so my husband keeps his stuff organized. Only wish the pockets varied in size for larger items.
customer_reviews.author: Angela nakayama

customer_reviews.title: Nice Caddy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking caddy, it is sturdy and functions as described.
customer_reviews.author: KAz

customer_reviews.title: It does the trick
customer_reviews.text: I don't have room my fiance side of the bed for a night stand. This does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Tameka

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and doesn't stick out from the bed too much. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a lofted bed and have been looking for a good spot to put my phone so that I can ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a lofted bed and have been looking for a good spot to put my phone so that I can reach it in the mornings to turn off my alarm without tumbling out of bed. This organizer works perfectly so far. Easy to slip under my mattress to anchor it down, and it stays secured even with my laptop in the largest pocket. Great buy for any lofted or bunk bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ji-Hyun Song

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bedside necessities
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Keeps everything I need at arm's length.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Woman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I didn't order this earlier. It's so convenient, and now my nightstand isn't overcrowded.
customer_reviews.author: Jczar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the bedside storage. Dont have to rumbling though the bed looking for the remote
customer_reviews.author: Tera K

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: These are a very nice size and do stay in place. They help keep remotes and charging cords off the bedside table.
customer_reviews.author: Waterbugg

customer_reviews.title: great product..
customer_reviews.text: fits perfect even on rounded bar on hospital bed. excellent quality and fit, lots of room for all needed supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Rz

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE THIS ONE SO MUCH BETTER THAN THE FIRST ONE ...
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE THIS ONE SO MUCH BETTER THAN THE FIRST ONE I PURCHASED. THIS ONE HOLDS MY KINDLE, GLASSES, PHONE. STAYS IN PLACE. I AM VERY PLEASED
customer_reviews.author: Nelson  I 've been having truble with this app for about 2wks  It wont load and I uave to reinstall it

customer_reviews.title: Very Small pockets
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised it was so small and the pockets are very small as well. Wished it was larger.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it's a good product. Not pretty and not particularly sturdy but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: It would be perfect for my purposes if it had rubberized backing
customer_reviews.text: If you have an adjustable bed this might not be for you. It slides off of the platform portion and ends up on the floor every time I move the bed even a tiny bit. I'm going to put some of those rubbery silicone dots on it in hopes that it will solve the problem. Other than that, this item is well made and holds the fat remote for the bed, a DirecTv remote, and a sidearm with room to spare for thinner paperbacks and/or magazines. It would be perfect for my purposes if it had rubberized backing. If you have a regular bed with a typical mattress you'll probably be very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: . Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Just what I need so my bedside table isn't cluttered and stuff dropping on the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Florence

customer_reviews.title: but i still enjoy for what it does for
customer_reviews.text: Splits out from the bed on me sometimes.. but i still enjoy for what it does for me
customer_reviews.author: Mike Russell

customer_reviews.title: Would have been nice for them to include a velcro strap to hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Would have been nice for them to include a velcro strap to hold on but it wasn't bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Abe

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Pockets are sturdy and gets the phone/tablet out from under the pillows. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: WendyR

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but small
customer_reviews.text: This pouch is on the smaller side so it's great only if you have a few items to store. The magazine/book pouch is very slim so there's no chance of fitting a thick book in it, and thr mesh pouches don't hold much either. Regardless for the price it's definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the money
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, bought 2 and they both come in handy. Great item for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Truebliss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for holding my glasses and cellphone on my bedside as I have no room for a table. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Carter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my caddy. Prefect fur and goes well with decor of room. Super convient!
customer_reviews.author: Zariah UV Russell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the top bunk of our camper to hold phone and musc stuff.
customer_reviews.author: carre17

customer_reviews.title: Great item for wife to hide remotes
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for her side of the bed, can't ever find the remote now. But sure enough it's always there
customer_reviews.author: Duane Bryant

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I serves its purpose, nothing to complain. Just a note, these compartments do not stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Tacos
